column_description: Indicates if the record was soft-deleted by Fivetran.
Timestamp the record was synced by Fivetran.
Code indicating the difficulty level in filling the position.
Flag indicating whether the position is considered critical based on the job profile.
Code indicating the category of the job profile associated with the position.
Code indicating the management level associated with the job profile.
Name associated with the job profile linked to the position.
Flag indicating whether a work shift is required.
